# The Complete POS System for Liquor Stores
Industry leading liquor and wine store point-of-sale system. Consolidate receiving, ecommerce, delivery apps and more in one simple platform.
[Schedule a Demo->](https://santehq.com/</demo>)

The fastest growing POS in the liquor industry.
Proven to grow revenue and simplify operations, you have everything you need to run your business in one platform.
Modern Hardware
Fast, reliable in-store processing that's ridiculously easy to use.
Sell Everywhere
Your website, delivery apps, etc. Manage it all in one place.
Powered by AI
Save hours each week with our AI inventory management system.
And Much More...
Advanced reporting, reordering, multi-store, attendance, and more.
![Hardware](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhardware-aaron.727416c9.png&w=1920&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
Liquor stores & wine shops love Santé.
![Modal video thumbnail](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Faaron.251c17dd.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
A renowned liquor store franchise in New Jersey. Their discount stores offer a vast selection of beer, wine and spirits at unbeatable prices.
Aaron at **Joe Canal’s**
Egg Harbor, NJ
We switched both of our stores to Santé after 26 years with LiquorPOS, and it’s been a gamechanger for our business. Santé has made our lives easier with faster inventory transfer capabilities and quicker checkout at the register.
![Modal video thumbnail](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Falbert.d99d21f7.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
One of the largest retailers of Soju in the country, serving the bustling Flushing community since 1947.
Albert at **Leiser’s Liquors**
Flushing, NY
We’ve always had separate vendors for POS, eCommerce and merchant services. With everything in Santé, we’re no longer dealing with inventory delays on our website or trying to connect the dots with multiple different platforms.
![Modal video thumbnail](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjoyce.fbe9265f.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
A local favorite in the heart of New York City’s West Village neighborhood since 2001.
Joyce at **Spirits of Carmine**
New York, NY
Santé is saving us so much time on inventory receiving and ordering that we were able to cut down on staff during slow hours of the day. It’s made everything run smoother and helped us cut down on costs too. Great system!
![Modal video thumbnail](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdev.288bceea.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
A booming multi-store operation with several locations across Massachusetts.
Dev at **Liquor Market**
Worburn, MA
Before Santé, we were buried with receiving invoices across all of our locations. Santé has cut that time in half. We’re saving on payroll, and our employees are happier because no one really wants to input these invoices into the system all day.
![Modal video thumbnail](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbob.9189b10d.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
A warehouse store with one of the largest wine and spirits selction in New York – conveniently located next door to BJ’s in Queens.
Bob at **Wine Cellar of Queens**
Queens, NY
After over a decade with Atlantic Systems, we switched to Santé, and it's transformed our operation. Ordering products used to take up so much of my time, but now I can create purchase orders in minutes and focus on my customers.
![Modal video thumbnail](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fleary.a1f530c5.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
The go-to liquor store for Darien locals for over 50 years. Located right across the street from the Metro North train station.
Sean at **Leary’s Liquor Cabinet**
Darien, CT
Switching from WinePOS to Santé has helped us simplify our business. From checkout to the back-office, everything is more user-friendly in Santé. It’s made training new staff easier. We couldn’t be happier with the change.
![Modal video thumbnail](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdean.1fe5fcc0.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
Voted one of the top beer shops by Wine Enthusiast with over 500 craft beers to choose from.
Dean at **Carmine St. Beers**
New York, NY
Santé helped us launch an amazing website in minutes that came with images and descriptions of all our products. Now I’m reaching new customers everywhere in the city who can easily find our unique selection of craft beers!
![Modal video thumbnail](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdavid.04dde248.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
Boutique wine shop in Bronxville, NY with an eclectic selection of independent wine, cider and spirits producers.
David at **Wine Gems**
Bronxville, NY
Having been on Square for several years, we knew how valuable a modern system could be, but we were always missing features that are more unique to wine. Santé gives us the best of both worlds in a user-friendly package.

Receive and manage inventory 10x faster.
Our AI-powered receiving software saves you hours every week and minimizes human error.
Smart Product Pricing
Monitor cost changes directly as you receive products. No more guessing.
Automated Data Entry
From long beer invoices to small distributors, Santé reads and digitalizes all your invoices.
Off-Site Inventory Support
Easily manage off-site inventory, Bill & Hold, or bulk orders stored at your warehouse.
Take your e-commerce sales to the next level.
![Planet](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fecom.03b894bd.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
### Modern Design
Stand out from the competition with homepage designs that are unique to your brand and products.
### Product Images
You'll never have to add product images again. We have a vast catalog of images for wines, beers, and spirits.
### Automated Collections
Effortlessly feature products on your homepage based on holidays, events, and brand features.
### Local Delivery Made Easy
Get free access to our network of drivers that deliver e-commerce orders directly to your customers.
### Nationwide Shipping
Manage complex interstate shipping regulations, easily track shipments, and reach shoppers across the country.
### Leading SEO
Improving your search engine ranking so more customers find your site when they're shopping online.

![Customer support](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fintercom.e2c1a873.png&w=828&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)
## Frequently Asked Questions
  * Why should I switch to Santé?
The world is changing, and we're here to help you adapt. Santé is the only modern POS system that offers a complete solution for liquor stores and wine shops, including receiving, e-commerce, delivery apps, and more.
  * When is the best time to switch?
The best time to switch is now. Our white-glove onboarding is designed to be quick and easy. Our team has experience transferring data over from other POS systems, so you can be up and running in a matter of hours.
  * How much does it cost?
In most cases, we are able to match or beat your current processing rates. We also charge a flat software fee, which varies based on the size of your operation.
  * Are there any other fees?
Most point-of-sale systems in the liquor industry charge hidden fees like compliance fees, gateway fees, etc. We don't. Our pricing is simple and transparent, so you always know what you're paying.
  * Can I test it before switching?
Yes! After your initial consultation with our sales team, we'll set you up with a demo account so you can see how Santé works firsthand.


![Dan Newcomb](https://santehq.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdan.ce943b65.png&w=96&q=75&dpl=dpl_9L1UMQF1D9Akpu4MNWd8AJC8CZWc)

## Frequently Asked Questions
  * Why should I switch to Santé?
The world is changing, and we're here to help you adapt. Santé is the only modern POS system that offers a complete solution for liquor stores and wine shops, including receiving, e-commerce, delivery apps, and more.
  * When is the best time to switch?
The best time to switch is now. Our white-glove onboarding is designed to be quick and easy. Our team has experience transferring data over from other POS systems, so you can be up and running in a matter of hours.
  * How much does it cost?
In most cases, we are able to match or beat your current processing rates. We also charge a flat software fee, which varies based on the size of your operation.
  * Are there any other fees?
Most point-of-sale systems in the liquor industry charge hidden fees like compliance fees, gateway fees, etc. We don't. Our pricing is simple and transparent, so you always know what you're paying.
  * Can I test it before switching?
Yes! After your initial consultation with our sales team, we'll set you up with a demo account so you can see how Santé works firsthand.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Santé**

Founded in 2023 and headquartered in New York, Santé is an innovative player in the fintech space, specifically targeting liquor stores with its all-in-one point-of-sale (POS) system. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, it's clear this startup has ambitions to shake up the retail landscape for liquor and wine shops.

**Mission Statement:**
Santé aims to provide a comprehensive POS solution that consolidates receiving, e-commerce, and delivery apps into a single, user-friendly platform, thereby simplifying operations and boosting revenue for liquor retailers.

**Team and Partnerships:**
With a lean team of just two employees, the company is guided by the insights of Jared Friedman, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. Despite its small size, Santé is making waves in the B2B domain, focusing heavily on the retail side of fintech.

**What Makes Santé Stand Out?**
1. **Comprehensive Functionality:** 
   - The POS system integrates not just cash sales but also e-commerce and delivery app management.
   - Features include AI-powered inventory management, which streamlines stock handling and optimizes reorder processes.
   
2. **Modern Hardware:** 
   - The system is designed for fast, reliable in-store processing, making it easy for staff to handle transactions quickly.

3. **User-Focused Design:** 
   - The interface is straightforward enough to reduce training time for new employees, making transitions smoother for liquor businesses moving from older systems.

4. **Customer-Centric Approach:**
   - Santé has established a reputation for responsiveness with 24/7 US-based customer support, ensuring that users have their problems solved promptly.

5. **Integrations:** 
   - The platform supports multiple delivery apps, meaning retailers can manage their sales across various channels from one location.

**Client Experiences:**
Several liquor store owners across locations like New Jersey, New York, and Boston have shared testimonials praising Santé. They commend the platform for significantly enhancing their operational efficiency—from handling inventory to managing customer interactions.

**Conclusion:**
If you run a liquor store and are bogged down by outdated systems or juggling multiple vendors, Santé offers a modern, intuitive alternative designed to address the specific needs of the liquor retail industry. The focus on integrating multiple functionalities into one system not only speaks to its innovative spirit but also sets it apart in a crowded field. You can learn more or schedule a demo at [Santé's official website](https://santehq.com).
